Articles.Content:
Dreamscape Skybox Pack 2.0

Javascript is disabled. View full album

This pack requires Tingle's wonderful Universe Replacer plugin found here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/44135-0-21-x-Universe-Replacer. I tried to make the galaxy more overwhelming, glittering, and with a sort splatter paint effect like old space art. Anyway, you can get the texture files here: http://d.pr/f/RLsO They are 2k textures, I haven't experienced any slowdown on my modest laptop. Let me know what you think, suggestions, comments. Keep in mind i'm trying to keep a niche where it isn't too realistic.

To install, place the files in ksp_win/gamedata/universereplacer/textures/skybox.

I tried to make the galaxy more overwhelming, glittering, and with a sort splatter paint effect like old space art.

Is this newer than the update you posted the other night?

Is this newer than the update you posted the other night?

No, it's the same one.
When I put this in the Universe Replacer's skybox folder (like the Skybox_NegativeZ.png) and boot up KSP the skybox is just the normal default skybox. I'm on a Mac so that might the problem.

On 10/12/2013 at 5:30 PM, The Spacemonkey said:

When I put this in the Universe Replacer's skybox folder (like the Skybox_NegativeZ.png) and boot up KSP the skybox is just the normal default skybox. I'm on a Mac so that might the problem.

 

I know this post is 4 years old but I got it working in 1.2.2 with TextureReplacer.

Notice how all the images are called a variation of Skybox_PositiveX

Rename it to GalaxyTex_PositiveX. Do this for all the images

It completely works, I'm on a Mac too.
